Example 1:

Hypotheses:

m + S n = S n + m

Example 2:

dart = nat : Set

intros m x y m1 H.

original: intros m x y m1 H. unfold m1. intros H0. destruct H0 as [H1 H2]. rewrite y_L0 with (m:=m)(x:=x)(y:=y) in H. unfold cA_1 in H. rewrite x0_L0 with (m:=m)(x:=x)(y:=y) in H. rewrite H. auto.
